How to Give Alumni Community Who We Are Events Publications Recognitions Awards Computer Science and Engineering Summer Camp Electrical Engineering Summer Camp Support Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Alumni Society Penn State Engineering Alumni Society Penn State Alumni Association Giving Volunteer Ting He Associate Professor Affiliation(s): School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Computer Science and Engineering W334 Westgate Building tzh58@psu.edu 814-865-1265 Research Areas: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence; Network and Mobile Systems; Security and Privacy Interest Areas: Statistical inference, information theory, control theory, online learning, and graph theory Research Departments Alumni Give Directory About The School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science was created in the spring of 2015 to allow greater access to courses offered by both departments for undergraduate and graduate students in exciting collaborative research fields. We offer B.S. degrees in electrical engineering, computer science, computer engineering and data science and graduate degrees (master's degrees and Ph.D.'s) in electrical engineering and computer science and engineering. EECS focuses on the convergence of technologies and disciplines to meet today’s industrial demands.
